text: "So Small" is a song by American singer Carrie Underwood from her second studio album, Carnival Ride (2007). ==Music video== The music video for "So Small" was directed by Roman White. It premiered on CMT on September 20, 2007. The video debuted at number 20 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of October 4, 2007. The video peaked at number 1 on CMT's Top Twenty Countdown for two consecutive weeks. ==References== Category:2007 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Country ballads Category:Carrie Underwood songs
title: So Small
